text: Abaho msenga iyagwe wa Mulungu wa kuulanga, yakalile yagogile kia cha zahabu cha kufushila ubane mmakono gake, keza na kwima hana ikilingo cha kulavila nhosa. Heyo kagweleligwa ubane bwando yaulave hamoja na nhambiko za wanhu wose wa Mulungu, yakavilave uchana ya ikilingo cha zahabu cha kulavila nhosa haulongozi wa ikigoda cha undewa.
